ai.summary: Clapton Circuit is an 11 km circular hike in the United Kingdom, rated as moderate. The route weaves through a mix of country lanes, woodland paths, and gentle ascents, suitable for hikers with some experience and solid footwear. Dry conditions make footing easier, but expect muddy patches after rain.
ai.terrain_summary: Trail surfaces include grassy fields, packed earth, and gravel tracks with occasional surfaced sections. Expect uneven footing, short ascents, gates or stiles, and potential boggy patches in wet weather. You may encounter livestock and cyclists on shared paths.
ai.safety_notes: Check the weather forecast before starting. Wear sturdy waterproof boots and dress in layers. Bring a map or GPS, a charged phone, water and snacks, and a small first aid kit. Stay on marked paths, be cautious of other users on shared sections, and plan for reduced daylight in winter.
recommended_gear: Map or GPS device / offline maps
Headlamp or flashlight (for shorter daylight months)
Whistle and phone with emergency contacts
Light rain cover or packable rain jacket
ai.best_seasons: Spring, Summer, and Autumn; can be muddy and cold in Winter, so plan accordingly.

seo.title: Clapton Circuit – 11 km Moderate Circular Hike in the UK
